Getting Started
 Twinfo is twitter information fetching application. It uses PeerReach API for request.
 HOW IT WORKS:
Just Enter the Twitter handle(without @) on the main page and click Twinfo button.

 You will Get the required info.

 WHAT TO DO IF TWINFO DOESNT WORK:
 1. Restart the App.
 2. Check Your Internet Connection. Twinfo requires active internet connection to fetch data.
 3. Check if you have typed the twitter handle correctly without any spelling mistakes
 4. Allow all the required permissions for the app (Asked just after installation).
 5. Try after sometime as twinfo uses an API with limited requests.

 If none of the above solution works.
 Leave a feedback with detailed information
 We will get back to you as soon as possible.
 THANKS FOR USING TWINFO
